summary: Completed comprehensive testing of VOCT Healthcare website. All core features working correctly including homepage, navigation, footer links, backend APIs, and authentication flow.

minor_issues.issue: Console warnings about insufficient slides for loop mode
minor_issues.impact: No functional impact, just console warnings

passed_tests: OTP Send/Verify flow with demo OTP
Homepage loads with VOCT hero section
Navigation works (Services, Join Us, About Us, Login)
Footer email link support@voct.in with mailto
Service cards display and interactive (6 swiper slides)
Navigation between pages (Join Us, About Us)
